name: CMHeadphoneMotionManager
desc: An object that starts and manages headphone motion services.

items.name: var isDeviceMotionAvailable: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the current device supports the headphone motion manager.

items.name: var isDeviceMotionActive: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the headphone motion manager is active.

items.name: class func authorizationStatus() -> CMAuthorizationStatus
items.desc: Returns the authorization status for monitoring headphone motion.

items.name: func startDeviceMotionUpdates(to: OperationQueue, withHandler: CMHeadphoneMotionManager.DeviceMotionHandler)
items.desc: Starts device-motion updates with a handler.

items.name: var delegate: CMHeadphoneMotionManagerDelegate?
items.desc: The object that receives headphone motion manager events.

items.name: protocol CMHeadphoneMotionManagerDelegate
items.desc: A set of methods that defines an interface for connecting and disconnecting headphones.
